QuestData.Title: Ahead on the Way
QuestData.Description: Huge maws of despair are spewing out sha from the pagodas on either side of the temple. Meanwhile, your impromptu training in the Way continues.$B$B"She who mends torn umbrella will be more dry than she who strikes at rain."$B$BWhile I take issue with that particular lesson--sometimes punching the rain can be quite effective--the meaning holds true in this case.$B$BTake out those maws of despair and give my order a chance at reclaiming the temple grounds.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill the Maw of Despair in both the eastern and western pagodas at the Temple of the Red Crane.
QuestData.CompletionText: Koro said there's a pagoda on either side of the temple. Let's find them and wipe out the sha presence in both.
QuestData.RewardText: Koro's metaphors can get a little tiring, but there's always true wisdom behind them.
